name: Even Closer (Demo)
description:
This is a demo for an game coming out Fall 2020!

Even Closer is a sidescrolling indie RPG about two people exploring a strange world filled with odd monsters, complex locales, and fun stories! Explore the massive abyss to find new abilities! Combat is turn-based, and gives the player plenty of options to choose from to keep fights interesting and strategic. Feedback from this demo will effect the full game! The full thing will have 9 areas not featured in the demo, original music, and added polish! The demo is about 30 minutes long, and the full game should be around 4-5 hours.
